_meta.source: Kapner, D. J., et al. (2007). Tests of the Gravitational Inverse-Square Law below the Dark-Energy Length Scale. Phys. Rev. Lett. 98, 021101.
_meta.description: Exclusion limits (95% CL) for Yukawa corrections to Newtonian gravity: V(r) = -GmM/r * (1 + alpha * exp(-r/lambda)). Areas above the curve are excluded.
